00022 #region Usings
00023 using Utilities.DataTypes;

00026 namespace Utilities.Math
00027 {
00031     public static class MathHelper
00032     {
00033         #region Public Static Functions
00034 
00040         public static double Mean(System.Collections.Generic.List<int> Values)
00041         {
00042             if (Values.Count == 0)
00043                 return 0.0;
00044             double ReturnValue = 0.0;
00045             for (int x = 0; x < Values.Count; ++x)
00046             {
00047                 ReturnValue += Values[x];
00048             }
00049             return ReturnValue / (double)Values.Count;
00050         }
00051 
00057         public static double Mean(System.Collections.Generic.List<double> Values)
00058         {
00059             if (Values.Count == 0)
00060                 return 0.0;
00061             double ReturnValue = 0.0;
00062             for (int x = 0; x < Values.Count; ++x)
00063             {
00064                 ReturnValue += Values[x];
00065             }
00066             return ReturnValue / (double)Values.Count;
00067         }
00068 
00075         public static T Median<T>(System.Collections.Generic.List<T> Values)
00076         {
00077             if (Values.Count == 0)
00078                 return default(T);
00079             Values.Sort();
00080             return Values[(Values.Count / 2)];
00081         }
00082 
00089         public static T Mode<T>(System.Collections.Generic.List<T> Values)
00090         {
00091             if (Values.Count == 0)
00092                 return default(T);
00093             Bag<T> Items = new Bag<T>();
00094             for(int x=0;x<Values.Count;++x)
00095             {
00096                 Items.Add(Values[x]);
00097             }
00098 
00099             int MaxValue = 0;
00100             T MaxIndex = default(T);
00101             foreach(T Key in Items)
00102             {
00103                 if(Items[Key]>MaxValue)
00104                 {
00105                     MaxValue = Items[Key];
00106                     MaxIndex = Key;
00107                 }
00108             }
00109             return MaxIndex;
00110         }
00111 
00117         public static double Variance(System.Collections.Generic.List<double> Values)
00118         {
00119             if (Values == null || Values.Count == 0)
00120                 return 0;
00121             double MeanValue = Mean(Values);
00122             double Sum = 0;
00123             for (int x = 0; x < Values.Count; ++x)
00124             {
00125                 Sum += System.Math.Pow(Values[x] - MeanValue, 2);
00126             }
00127             return Sum / (double)Values.Count;
00128         }
00129 
00135         public static double StandardDeviation(System.Collections.Generic.List<double> Values)
00136         {
00137             return System.Math.Sqrt(Variance(Values));
00138         }
00139 
00140         #endregion
00141     }
00142 }
